Package gov.fnal.ppd.signage.xml

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeChannel
    Message from a Control Panel to the Display Server to change the thing being shown on a Display
    ChangeChannelList
    Message from a Control Panel to the Display Server to change the channel on a Display to a LIST of Channels
    ChannelListRequest
    Request from a Control Panel to the Display Server for the list of Channels.
    ChannelListResponse
    Request from a Control Panel to the Display Server for the list of Channels.
    ChannelSpec
    Message from a Control Panel that specifies a Channel (SignageContent)
    EmptyChannel
    An empty channel for use by these XML classes
    EncodedCarrier
    Base class for all the XML classes.
    EncryptionService
    A service for conducting the encryption of messages.
    HeartBeat
    A simple heartbeat class for the Messaging Server to send out from time to time
    MyXMLMarshaller
    Utility class for making Strings out of XML objects, and vice versa.
    Ping
    Implementation of the "ping" message
    PlainImageChange  
    Pong  
    ScreenDump
    A request from a console to the Display Server to put (some of) its screen onto a Display
    StatusRequestToDisplay
    Request from a Control Panel to the Display Server for the status of a Display
    WriteXMLFile
    Test program to show how to create XML files from the Channel/Display architecture developed here.
